headline: U.S. Consumers Spent $241.4 Billion Online During Holiday 2024, Adobe Reports
summary: Discounting, enhanced apps and chatbots factored into sales gains seen by retailers during the Nov. 1 to Dec. 31 period.

headline: AMD and Adobe get analyst downgrades for AI-related concerns
summary: Brad Smith and Madison Mills take a look at Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) and Adobe (ADBE), two names on Yahoo Finance's trending ticker platform. AMD shares are under pressure, hovering near its 52-week low after HBSC downgraded the stock and lowered its price target, citing the chipmaker's less-than-ideal position in the competitive artificial intelligence (AI) chip market. Adobe also received a downgrade from analysts, with Deutsche Bank saying the company lacks tangible evidence of AI monetization. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
